↕ Estamos unidos para hacer del mundo un lugar mejor. Creemos que todos merecen una vida más saludable. Lideramos con empatía, respeto y gratitud. Actuamos con integridad, haciendo las cosas de la manera correcta, por las razones correctas, sin importar lo que pase. Apoyamos a los demás compartiendo generosamente nuestros recursos y talentos. Trabajamos todos los días para ganarnos la confianza de todas nuestras partes interesadas. ↕ Vertical Spacer ↕ ↕ Vertical Spacer ↕ SOMOS INCLUSIVOS ↕ Vertical Spacer ↕ Creamos un sentido de pertenencia para todos. Cultivamos un entorno en el que las personas puedan ser auténticas. Fomentamos una cultura de pertenencia en la que todos se sientan valorados, parte de un equipo global y empoderados para hacer cosas extraordinarias. Diseñamos las mejores soluciones acogiendo los talentos, las perspectivas y los antecedentes únicos de nuestra diversa fuerza laboral. Formamos los equipos más fuertes y creamos caminos poderosos para nuestra

extraordinarias. Diseñamos las mejores soluciones acogiendo los talentos, las perspectivas y los antecedentes únicos de nuestra diversa fuerza laboral. Formamos los equipos más fuertes y creamos caminos poderosos para nuestra gente y nuestras comunidades que rompen las barreras diarias para la equidad de oportunidades. ↕ Vertical Spacer ↕ ↕ Vertical Spacer ↕ ↕ Vertical Spacer ↕ TENEMOS VALENTÍA ↕ Vertical Spacer ↕ Impulsamos el cambio y hacemos que las cosas sucedan. Pensamos en grande. Somos infinitamente curiosos y buscamos constantemente mejores formas de trabajar. Nos desafiamos unos a otros y a nuestra forma de hacer las cosas, sin miedo a alterar el statu quo, innovando, explorando y alcanzando lo que es posible de manera audaz e intencional. Reconocemos que para crecer y prosperar debemos aprovechar el poder que nos proporciona nuestro legado, escala y alcance para el bien y para todos. ↕ Vertical Spacer ↕ ↕ Vertical Spacer ↕ ↕

Read more about how we bring this value to life. Our Commitment to Inclusion Embracing diverse voices and fostering an inclusive work environment isn’t just something we do; it’s embedded into the company, reflecting who we are, what we value and how we think. Inclusion guides our daily work, empowering our people to achieve their potential and positively impact the

into the company, reflecting who we are, what we value and how we think. Inclusion guides our daily work, empowering our people to achieve their potential and positively impact the business, enabling us to better serve our communities. Our Values By living our Colgate Values of Caring, Inclusive and Courageous, we create a culture in which people act as a team, working together toward common goals. These values guide our actions, shape our decisions, and inspire us to reimagine a healthier future for all. We believe that when we embrace our unique talents, perspectives, and backgrounds, we can solve the toughest problems and create the best solutions. Who We Are We are Caring We are united in making the world a better place. Our actions are guided by empathy, respect, and genuine gratitude. Integrity drives our decisions—doing things the right way, for the right reasons, regardless of circumstances. Everyone deserves

a better place. Our actions are guided by empathy, respect, and genuine gratitude. Integrity drives our decisions—doing things the right way, for the right reasons, regardless of circumstances. Everyone deserves access to a healthier life. We are Inclusive We create a sense of belonging for all and cultivate an environment where people can be their authentic selves. We foster a culture of belonging where CP People feel valued, part of a global team, and empowered to do extraordinary things. We design the best solutions by embracing the unique talents, perspectives and backgrounds of our global workforce. We are Courageous A Strategic Differentiator At Colgate-Palmolive, diverse perspectives accelerate our growth. People We fuel sustainable growth by building a global talent pipeline with diverse backgrounds and perspectives. We achieve this by developing our people through meaningful experiences, cultivating a high-impact, inclusive culture where all voices drive innovation, and advancing next-gen enterprise capabilities

with diverse backgrounds and perspectives. We achieve this by developing our people through meaningful experiences, cultivating a high-impact, inclusive culture where all voices drive innovation, and advancing next-gen enterprise capabilities as a competitive advantage. Culture We cultivate a globally inclusive workplace where every voice matters, empowering all employees to thrive through impactful contributions and rewarding growth. We harness the power of inclusion for collective success by fostering a deep sense of belonging rooted in our values and purpose to reimagine a healthier future for all. Business and Community Impact We actively build a global and varied network of talent and partners, leveraging high-performing teams for growth and innovation. As owners of some of the world's most penetrated brands, we nurture authentic relationships and meaningful partnerships with suppliers, customers, consumers and our communities, driving growth, trust, and shared opportunity. Our events and initiatives foster connection and create spaces where everyone feels valued.

Our events and initiatives foster connection and create spaces where everyone feels valued. Together, we build a culture where belonging is continuously prioritized and celebrated. Fueling Growth ERGs Power Skills Development Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) are vital to fostering a stronger, more connected workforce with future ready skills. By facilitating meaningful learning initiatives, ERGs provide opportunities for all employees to deepen their knowledge in key areas, fostering continuous growth and helping to ensure workforce readiness for tomorrow’s challenges. Shaping Tomorrow Colgate’s Global Summer Internship Program Colgate’s Summer Internship Program offers unique opportunities for interns to develop new skills, gain global experience, and collaborate across cultures- empowering future leaders. Supporting Wellbeing Live Better Our Live Better program empowers physical, mental and financial wellbeing and connection. Our holistic approach helps employees thrive personally and professionally,

He has led businesses across North America, Europe, Africa, Eurasia, and Latin America, and has also served as the Company's Chief Marketing Officer. John has championed strategic planning, cross-functional collaboration and innovation throughout his career. John holds an MBA from Harvard Business School. Throughout this history, Colgate people and Colgate values have been at the heart of our success. 1806-1820 1806: William Colgate starts a starch, soap and candle business on Dutch Street in New York

Colgate people and Colgate values have been at the heart of our success. 1806-1820 1806: William Colgate starts a starch, soap and candle business on Dutch Street in New York City. 1817: First Colgate advertisement appears in a New York newspaper. 1820: Colgate establishes a starch factory in Jersey City, New Jersey. 1857-1866 1857: Upon the death of founder William Colgate, the company is reorganized as Colgate & Company under the management of Samuel Colgate, our founder’s son. 1864: B.J. Johnson opens a soap factory in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, which later becomes the Palmolive Company. 1866: Colgate introduces perfumed soap and perfumes/essence. 1872-1879 1872: Peet brothers establish a soap company in Kansas City, Kansas where they make Crystal White soap. Cashmere Bouquet, the first milled perfumed toilet soap, is registered as a Colgate trademark. 1873: Colgate starts selling aromatic toothpaste in jars. 1879: Gerhard Mennen establishes a pharmacy in Newark, New

Bouquet, the first milled perfumed toilet soap, is registered as a Colgate trademark. 1873: Colgate starts selling aromatic toothpaste in jars. 1879: Gerhard Mennen establishes a pharmacy in Newark, New Jersey, which later becomes the Mennen Company. 1896-1898 1896: Colgate introduces toothpaste in a collapsible tube. 1898: B.J. Johnson Soap Co. introduces Palmolive Soap. Today, the Palmolive equity is sold in over 88 countries in 54 variants. 1900-1902 1900: Colgate wins top honors for its fine soaps and perfumes at the World’s Fair in Paris. 1902: Stylish Palmolive advertising begins, emphasizing ingredient purity and product benefits. 1906-1908 1906: Colgate is incorporated by the five sons of Samuel Colgate. Ribbon opening is added to the Colgate tube: “We couldn’t improve the product, so we improved the tube.” 1908: Colgate & Company celebrates its 100th anniversary. Our product line includes over 800 different products. 1911-1912 1911: Colgate distributes two million tubes of

Nuestra Línea de Atención al Consumidor está disponible para brindarle apoyo en y puede comunicarse al 018000520800 o por WhatsApp al +57 317 6405757 para recibir orientación. Un bajo porcentaje de personas en Colombia ha reportado problemas después de usar COLGATE TOTAL PREVENCIÓN ACTIVA CLEAN MINT©, como irritación e hinchazón bucal temporal, y la Compañía lamenta profundamente las dificultades que han experimentado. Nuestra Línea de Atención al Consumidor está disponible para brindarle apoyo en y puede comunicarse al 018000520800 o por WhatsApp al +57 317 6405757 para recibir orientación. Por precaución, la Compañía ha decidido dejar de vender la variante COLGATE TOTAL PREVENCIÓN ACTIVA CLEAN MINT©, a partir del 25 de julio de 2025. El resto de la línea Colgate Total Prevención Activa sigue disponible, así como todas las demás cremas dentales Colgate. Colgate-Palmolive reafirma la seguridad, calidad y eficacia de sus productos. Por eso nunca dejamos de buscar formas mejores y más sustentables de hacer nuestros productos y envases, lo que incluye

el medioambiente y comprendemos la necesidad de proteger el planeta. Por eso nunca dejamos de buscar formas mejores y más sustentables de hacer nuestros productos y envases, lo que incluye la búsqueda de nuevas opciones que nos permitan usar menos plástico, además de producir la menor cantidad posible de desechos y educar a las personas sobre el ahorro de agua. Al fin y al cabo, un planeta saludable siempre es motivo para sonreír. Uso de los recursos de forma responsable para un futuro mejor NUESTROS OBJETIVOS DE SOSTENIBILIDAD Sin envases problemáticos Lograr que todos nuestros envases de plástico sean reciclables, reutilizables o compostables en 2025. Cero emisiones de carbono Lograr cero emisiones netas de carbono en 2040 y un 100 % de electricidad renovable para nuestras operaciones globales en 2030. Instalaciones con residuos cero Gestionar plantas de alta eficiencia, bajo impacto y residuos cero y lograr un 100 % de

% de electricidad renovable para nuestras operaciones globales en 2030. Instalaciones con residuos cero Gestionar plantas de alta eficiencia, bajo impacto y residuos cero y lograr un 100 % de operaciones con residuos cero. Edificios con consumo neutro de agua Lograr un consumo neto cero de agua en nuestras plantas de fabricación situadas en zonas con escasez de agua para 2025 y en todas las plantas para 2030. Condiciones de uso Política de privacidad Condiciones de venta No vender mi información personal X AVISO A NUESTROS CONSUMIDORES – COLGATE TOTAL PREVENCIÓN ACTIVA CLEAN MINT© Colgate-Palmolive está comprometido con el apoyo a la salud bucal de los colombianos. Un bajo porcentaje de personas en Colombia ha reportado problemas después de usar COLGATE TOTAL PREVENCIÓN ACTIVA CLEAN MINT©, como irritación

el apoyo a la salud bucal de los colombianos. Un bajo porcentaje de personas en Colombia ha reportado problemas después de usar COLGATE TOTAL PREVENCIÓN ACTIVA CLEAN MINT©, como irritación e hinchazón bucal temporal, y la Compañía lamenta profundamente las dificultades que han experimentado. Si ha experimentado alguna molestia o irritación, le recomendamos que suspenda el uso de esta variante. Nuestra Línea de Atención al Consumidor está disponible para brindarle apoyo en y puede comunicarse al 018000520800 o por WhatsApp al +57 317 6405757 para recibir orientación. Por precaución, la Compañía ha decidido dejar de vender la variante COLGATE TOTAL PREVENCIÓN ACTIVA CLEAN MINT©, a partir del 25 de julio de 2025. El resto de la línea Colgate Total Prevención Activa sigue disponible, así como todas las demás cremas dentales Colgate. Colgate-Palmolive reafirma la seguridad, calidad y eficacia de sus productos. Our Sustainability Strategy Colgate-Palmolive is committed to a healthier future for all people, their pets and our planet. We're accelerating climate action, reducing our environmental footprint and collaborating to eliminate waste, decrease plastic use, save water and conserve resources. Our strategy focuses on three ambitions: Driving Social Impact,

We're accelerating climate action, reducing our environmental footprint and collaborating to eliminate waste, decrease plastic use, save water and conserve resources. Our strategy focuses on three ambitions: Driving Social Impact, Helping Millions of Homes and Preserving Our Environment, as we reimagine a sustainable world. Driving Social Impact We are committed to ensuring the well-being of all people and their pets, building an inclusive culture and creating meaningful opportunities for all people to succeed inside and outside of Colgate-Palmolive. Helping Millions of Homes We are empowering people and communities to develop healthier habits by choosing sustainable products that improve their lives and homes from oral and personal care to pet nutrition and home care. Preserving Our Environment We are working to accelerate action on climate and reduce our environmental footprint , working with our partners and operations to eliminate waste, decrease plastic usage, save water and conserve natural resources. Impact in

accelerate action on climate and reduce our environmental footprint , working with our partners and operations to eliminate waste, decrease plastic usage, save water and conserve natural resources. Impact in Action 93% of our packaging is recyclable, reusable or compostable, as of December 31, 2024, up from 89.5% the previous year. ~ 60% In 2024, we signed a long-term virtual power purchase agreement for a wind farm in Europe, which is expected to cover the equivalent of approximately 60% of our Europe-based operational electricity needs. 70 + Our recyclable tube is accessible in over 70 countries. Since 2019, we have transitioned approximately 75% of our toothpaste SKUs globally and about 95% of our toothpaste tubes in North America to recyclable tubes as of December 31, 2024. The recyclable tube is now accessible in over 70 countries worldwide.* Innovating for a Sustainable Future To support our efforts to reduce virgin plastic,

The recyclable tube is now accessible in over 70 countries worldwide.* Innovating for a Sustainable Future To support our efforts to reduce virgin plastic, we are introducing an innovative, recyclable paper-based package for our manual toothbrushes, transitioning away from traditional plastic packaging. This transition, which began in 2025, marks the first step in our long-term vision to make this more sustainable packaging available to consumers around the world. *Your community may not yet accept tubes for recycling.
